title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: San Francisco Segway Tours - Electric Tour Company
address: Tours depart from the rear parking lot at 757 Beach St
directions: near the corner of Hyde St
hours: Segway tours Daily 9AM, 10:30Am, 12:30PM, 2:00PM and 4PM April–October & 10AM, 11:30AM, 1:30PM and 3:00PM November–March
content: Take a 2 1/2 tour of Fisherman's Wharf on a segway
